text: All miscellaneous metal items match submittals, shop drawings, and finish specs
Material tags and marking consistent with drawing references
Surface finish verified: galvanized, epoxy-coated, stainless, or primer-coated
No damage (warping, corrosion, dents) noted during delivery
Field-measured and shop-drawn to suit actual conditions before fabrication
Welds and cut edges ground smooth and free of sharp projections
Bends, cuts, holes as per shop drawings and tolerances
Installed in correct location and orientation per shop/erection drawings
Anchors/bolts used match specification (mechanical, epoxy, expansion)
Welds completed per approved WPS; CWB-certified where required
Embedded components coordinated with other trades and installed with appropriate tolerance
Coatings/touch-ups applied after installation where needed
Anchoring hardware tightened and concealed (if applicable)
Sharp edges, burrs, or obstructions removed before handover
As-built dimensions confirmed and accepted by QA/QC

id: • CSA S157 / A23.1 – Structural Steel Connections and Concrete Embeds
